props.name: popup-color-background
props.comment: Shared background color for all components similarily semantic to a popup.

props.name: popup-text-color
props.comment: Shared text color for all components visually represent a popup. The text must sit on top of `*-s-popup-color-background`

props.name: popup-color-border
props.comment: Shared border color for all components visually represent a popup. The border color must be coupled with `*-s-popup-color-background`

props.name: popup-sizing-border
props.comment: Shared border size for all components visually represent a popup.

props.name: popup-radius-border
props.comment: Shared border radius for all components visually represent a popup.

props.name: popup-shadow
props.comment: Shared shadow for all components visually represent a popup.

props.name: popup-spacing-inline
props.comment: Shared inline spacing for all components visually represent a popup.

props.name: popup-spacing-block
props.comment: Shared block spacing for all components visually represent a popup.
